page.description: Fires after the .addRows() method is called.

argument.name: data
argument.description: An array of rows that were added.

description.p: An object that contains information about the event. The object can have the following properties:

property.name: type
property.description: Indicates the event type. The event can be *[js:'append']* or *[js:'insert']*.

property.name: index
property.description: If *[js:info.type]* is an 'insert', then *[js:info.index]* contains the index at which the data was inserted.
